title: Drawing, "Wall Unit", ca. 1935
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/ NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower left: FOR VASSAR TO BE COMBINED WITH/ EXISTING PIECE OF ORIENTAL WALNUT AND/BLACK LACQUER BASE,INDIRECT LIGHT ABOVE BOOK; lower right margin: 8410
description: Perspective drawing of wall unit/book shelves. Raised central section with three shelves covered by glass, open shelf below, and two drawers at bottom. Side units each have three open shelves near top. Narrow unit at far right with two open shelves near top; open book displayed on top shelf. Wall unit on base of darker wood.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Wall Unit", ca. 1935.
ca. 1935. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1988-101-891.
